author: Jon Fingas
title: 'Beat Saber' now has an official song designed to keep you fit
description: Beat Saber is widely considered a good option for exercise in VR between the frantic arm waving, crouches and dodges, and Beat Games wants to capitalize on that. The studio’s former CEO and now game musician Jaroslav Beck recently released “FitBeat,” a free o…
